statements: SELECT * FROM email_segments;
SELECT segment_id, segment_name FROM email_segments WHERE segment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM email_segments WHERE segment_name LIKE '%New%';
SELECT segment_id, segment_name FROM email_segments WHERE engagement_filter IS NOT NULL;
SELECT segment_id, segment_name FROM email_segments ORDER BY segment_id DESC;
SELECT segment_id, segment_name FROM email_segments WHERE segment_id = 1;
SELECT segment_name FROM email_segments WHERE segment_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT segment_id, segment_name FROM email_segments WHERE segment_name LIKE '%marketing%';
SELECT * FROM email_segments WHERE demographics_filter = 'Age: 25-35' AND behaviors_filter = 'Interest: Technology';
SELECT segment_id, segment_name FROM email_segments WHERE engagement_filter IS NOT NULL ORDER BY segment_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM email_subscribers;
SELECT subscriber_id, email_address FROM email_subscribers ORDER BY subscriber_id DESC;
SELECT email_address FROM email_subscribers WHERE engagement_level > 3;
SELECT * FROM subscriber_segments ORDER BY segment_id;
SELECT segment_name, criteria FROM subscriber_segments WHERE segment_id < 5;
SELECT * FROM email_subscribers;
SELECT subscriber_id, email_address FROM email_subscribers ORDER BY subscriber_id DESC;
SELECT subscriber_id, email_address, engagement_level FROM email_subscribers WHERE engagement_level > 5;
SELECT subscriber_id, email_address, engagement_level FROM email_subscribers WHERE demographics->>'age' > '30';
SELECT email_address, engagement_level FROM email_subscribers INNER JOIN subscriber_segments ON email_subscribers.subscriber_id = subscriber_segments.segment_id;
SELECT * FROM segments_demographics;
SELECT segment_id, demographics_criteria FROM segments_demographics WHERE segment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM segments_behaviors ORDER BY segment_id DESC;
SELECT segment_id, behavior_criteria FROM segments_behaviors WHERE segment_id = 2;
SELECT segment_id, engagement_level FROM segments_engagement WHERE engagement_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM segments_demographics WHERE segment_id = 1;
SELECT segment_id, demographics_criteria FROM segments_demographics WHERE demographics_criteria LIKE '%age%';
SELECT s.segment_id, s.behavior_criteria, e.engagement_level FROM segments_behaviors s INNER JOIN segments_engagement e ON s.segment_id = e.segment_id;
SELECT * FROM segments_demographics WHERE segment_id > 3 ORDER BY segment_id DESC;
SELECT segment_id, COUNT(*) AS behavior_count FROM segments_behaviors GROUP BY segment_id HAVING behavior_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM demographics_segments;
SELECT segment_id, segment_name FROM behavior_segments ORDER BY segment_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM engagement_segments WHERE segment_id = 3;
SELECT segment_name, engagement_criteria FROM engagement_segments WHERE segment_name LIKE '%New%';
SELECT * FROM subscriber_relations WHERE subscription_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM demographics_segments ORDER BY segment_id DESC;
SELECT segment_name, demographic_criteria FROM demographics_segments WHERE segment_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT segment_name, COUNT(*) AS total_subscribers FROM subscriber_relations GROUP BY segment_id HAVING total_subscribers > 10;
SELECT engagement_criteria FROM engagement_segments WHERE segment_id = 2;

SELECT segment_name, subscriber_relations.email FROM demographics_segments INNER JOIN subscriber_relations ON demographics_segments.segment_id = subscriber_relations.segment_id WHERE subscription_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM subscriber_demographics;
SELECT subscriber_id, email_address, age, gender, location FROM subscriber_demographics;
SELECT subscriber_id, email_address FROM subscriber_behaviors WHERE clicks > 100;
SELECT email_address, opens FROM subscriber_behaviors WHERE subscriptions < 5;
SELECT segment_name, description FROM segment_demographics ORDER BY segment_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscriber_demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY subscriber_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT subscriber_id, email_address, location FROM subscriber_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT subscriber_id, email_address, age, gender FROM subscriber_demographics WHERE location LIKE '%York%' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT s.email_address, sb.clicks, sb.opens FROM subscriber_behaviors sb INNER JOIN subscriber_demographics s ON s.subscriber_id = sb.subscriber_id WHERE sb.subscriptions > 5 ORDER BY sb.clicks DESC

SELECT sd.segment_name, sb.behavior_type, sb.behavior_threshold FROM segment_behaviors sb INNER JOIN segment_demographics sd ON sb.segment_id = sd.segment_id WHERE sb.behavior_type = 'Clicks' ORDER BY sb.behavior_threshold DESC
